message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and specifically focuses on relation classification. Additionally, the use of word embeddings is a common technique in this field. 

It is also likely to belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as the paper presents a novel learning method for word embeddings. 

cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another likely sub-category as the paper deals with the development of a machine learning model for relation classification. 

cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a possible sub-category as the paper deals with the use of lexical features to predict words between noun pairs, which is relevant to information retrieval tasks. 

Finally, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is a possible sub-category as the paper uses neural network-based models for relation classification.
